work: Developed an Agentic system with topic-specific regulatory compilance agents and intelligent query routing. Utilized semantic vector search on PostgreSQL for financial regulation analysis.
Built a version-tracking platform for regulatory and compliance changes, enabling users to understand complex business logic for each reporting field, leveraging Neo4j, Angular, Spring
Developed AWS data migration pipelines, using Python for classification, reconciliation & transfer to the cloud
Optimized logging and monitoring by introducing ELK stack, reducing query response time from 2 hrs to mins.

Designed workflow orchestration using Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs) to model tasks such as translations, lookups, and filters. Built a custom topological sorting algorithm to optimize API call sequencing
Developed and maintained a Spring-based reconciliation platform with a dynamic, Angular 8-driven UI, enabling flexible workflow configuration for end-users.
Automated and standardized production job management by organizing and scripting over 15,000+ Autosys jobs using Python, Bash, and Perl, improving auditing and reliability across environments.
